name: SHINee "Everybody" Tumblr Dashboard
description:
Another one of my Tumblr dashboards!~ Credit to rosemonburstmode.tumblr.com. It's a very light/bright dashboard, so it's a large contrast to the darker ones I usually make. The Jonghyun tumblr logo is another piece of coding which can be installed on it's own. 

As always, feel free to message me if the theme doesn't work for you or if you're having problems installing it. 

As with all of my themes, the best screen resolution to view this theme is 1600 x 900 px
